availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Active Militia Records - Capital Guards, North Cumberland Btn., and Three Forks Btn.
msIdentifier.idno: Box 76, Folder 864-865 1st REGT CAPITAL GUARDS FRANKFORT BATTALION Oaths & Commissions of officers

body.p: By direction of His Excellency the Governor you will Issue Commission to Daniel W. Suddarth Assistant Surgeon Capitol Guard Regiment August 1. 1864

D, W, Lindsey
Inspr & Adjt Genl of Ky
1. 2. 3.

Capitol Guard Reg.
Suddarth D. W.
Ass. Surg
Com. issd August 4 1864 & deld
